backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the backend for a loan document generator, including user profile management, global/custom template CRUD, document generation, and loan processing records with role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting that the first footer image in PreviewDialog.tsx and renderDocumentToCanvas.ts was replaced with a Dhani Finance LTD. signature block image saved as a static asset.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON summary file describing the purpose and key details of each frontend source file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, primary, sidebar, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Vite-based React app, setting the page title to 'Loan Document Generator' and mounting the app at the #root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application component managing form state, template operations via useTemplates hook, PDF generation/download/share flow, and rendering the header, FormSection, and TemplateDesigner dialog.
frontend/src/components/FormSection.tsx: Loan form UI component handling applicant details, loan parameters, custom fields, EMI auto-calculation, and document download/share actions for both built-in and custom document types.
frontend/src/components/preview/Template: Renders absolute-positioned overlay elements (background image, watermark, seal, signature) on top of a document preview based on the provided template configuration.
frontend/src/components/PreviewDialog.ts: Renders a modal dialog showing a document preview with hardcoded Bajaj Finserv branding (logo, address, footer), overlaying template assets like watermarks, seals, and signatures via TemplateOverlay.
frontend/src/components/TemplateDesigner: A UI component for creating, editing, and saving both built-in and custom document templates, with support for previewing, deleting, and applying header settings across all templates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
A generic React hook that synchronizes a state value with localStorage, initializing from stored data and persisting updates on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating custom templates via the ICP backend actor, including getAllTemplates, getCustomTemplateById, addCustomTemplate, and updateCustomTemplate with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useTemplates.ts: Custom React hook that manages built-in and custom document templates, handling serialization/deserialization to/from a backend GlobalMasterTemplate format and syncing with localStorage and React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS entry point that sets up Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for a warm orange/amber color palette in both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Utility function that triggers a browser file download by creating a temporary object URL and anchor element for a given Blob.
frontend/src/lib/loan/calculateEmi.ts: Provides a function to calculate monthly EMI using the standard formula and a helper to format numbers as Indian Rupee currency strings.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/generatePdf.ts: Generates a minimal valid PDF file by rendering a document to a canvas, converting it to JPEG, and embedding it in a raw hand-built PDF structure without external libraries.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/layout.ts: Defines A4 page dimension constants at 96 DPI including margins, header/footer heights, and the usable content area rectangle.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/renderDocumentToCan: Renders a loan document onto an HTML canvas with hardcoded Bajaj Finserv branding, including a two-column header with logo, body content, signature/stamp row, and a footer with partner images.
frontend/src/lib/qr/qrPayload.ts: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/lib/qr/renderQr.ts: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/lib/shareUtils.ts: Utility that attempts to share a PDF Blob via the Web Share API and returns false if the API is unavailable or sharing fails, signaling a download fallback is needed.
frontend/src/lib/templateAssets/fileToDa: Converts an image File object to a base64 data URL using FileReader, rejecting non-image files.
frontend/src/lib/templateAssets/position: Provides helpers to convert a PositionPreset enum value into CSS style objects or canvas pixel coordinates for positioning elements like seals and signatures.
frontend/src/lib/templates/getTemplate.t: Defines default built-in templates for three loan document types and provides utilities to retrieve, normalize, and persist templates to/from localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/templates/renderTemplat: Renders a document template by replacing placeholder tokens (e.g. {{name}}, {{loanAmount}}) with actual form data values, including custom fields and currency-formatted numbers.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validates loan form data, returning an array of error messages for missing or invalid fields like name, loan amount, interest rate, year, and processing charge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/types/form.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and types for form data, including CustomField, LoanType, FormData, and DocumentType.
frontend/src/types/templates.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for document templates, including settings for background, watermark, logo, seal, signature, and both built-in and custom template shapes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme tokens (colors via OKLCH, fonts, border radius, shadows, animations) and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state and feature requests, currently recording a completed task to replace the first of four footer images in document preview and PDF rendering with a new signature/branding image.
